entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 05:53 AM AST Sunday 05 March 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: NNE 31 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow or freezing rain changing to rain at times heavy this morning. Snow at times heavy inland and over higher terrain late this afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm except snowfall amount 5 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High plus 3. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to snow this evening and ending overnight then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Snow at times heavy inland and over higher terrain. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Sunday 05 March 2023
